revised_title: The Life and Scientific Legacy of Nicolaus Copernicus
tldr: This article discusses the life and scientific contributions of Nicolaus Copernicus, who proposed the heliocentric model of the solar system, challenging the established Aristotelian-Ptolemaic cosmology. Copernicus's groundbreaking work laid the foundation for modern astronomy and the Copernican Revolution, which transformed our understanding of the universe. Despite facing opposition and skepticism, his ideas have had a lasting impact on the development of science.
